productDescription:
Savanna, our classic yet rebellious lady. Our latest adventure and first item of the new Atelier collection. 

The Savanna Bag is handmade of high quality leather, this classic lady matches every outfit. The stitched details give this minimalistic looking bag a special twist

This crossbody bag is perfect for carrying essentials and contains a spare pocket with a zipper on the inside so you can keep your mobile phone, cards, keys and money safe. It has an adjustable leather shoulder strap.

optionalInfo.fit:
Size: 22 cm x 16 cm x 6 cm
Length strap: adjustable
optionalInfo.additionalNotes: We pack your order in plastic-free package material. Free shipping on all NL orders.
